name: misgrade
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to give the wrong grade or points for a piece of work; to give someone the wrong grade for a piece of work: They were convinced that their exams had been misgraded. He demanded to see his test and said it was misgraded. Here’s how to appeal if you feel you’ve been misgraded. Related word
grade verb US
More examplesFewer examplesHe was sure that the teacher had misgraded his exam.Is it possible that this paper has been misgraded?Some students alleged their exams were misgraded.The answer sheets had been misgraded.
